name: Attuned_Touch_of_the_Nictus_B
display_name: Attuned Touch of the Nictus B
display_fullname: Boosts.Attuned Touch of the Nictus B
display_help: Enhances the healing potential and damage absorption of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Heal.Scale}% and reduces recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.RechargeTime.Scale}%. NOTE: This enhancement can only be slotted into healing powers that require a To Hit check.
